content:
Diagnosis
	1. Cervical adenocarcinoma FIGO stage IB1

	Date of diagnosis
	January 2024

	Treatment aim
	Curative

	Summary of completed treatment and relevant dates

	Surgery
	15 Jan 2024 Laparoscopic radical hysterectomy and pelvic lymph node dissection

	Radiotherapy
	Not indicated

	Chemotherapy
	Not indicated

	Clinical studies
	None

	Current disease status
	No evidence of disease

	Current issues
	Mild post-operative pelvic discomfort

	Summary of consultation
	This 42-year-old lady attended for her three-month post-operative review. She has made an excellent recovery from her surgery with good healing of her port sites. She reports occasional mild pelvic discomfort but this is improving week by week. She has returned to work part-time and is gradually increasing her activity levels.

On examination today, her vault is well-healed with no concerning features. Abdominal examination is normal with well-healed laparoscopy ports.

Histology from her surgery showed a 2.2cm moderately differentiated HPV-18 positive adenocarcinoma of the cervix. The margins were clear (>10mm) and there was no lymphovascular space invasion. All 18 pelvic lymph nodes were negative.

	Further investigations
	None required at present

	Medication prescribed
	None

	Follow up
	Next oncology follow up in 3 months with vault smear

	Required GP actions
	Routine health monitoring

	Summary of information given to the patient
	Discussed excellent prognosis given complete surgical resection and node-negative disease. Explained follow-up schedule of 3-monthly reviews for first two years.

primary_cancer.histopathology_status: moderately differentiated adenocarcinoma, 2.2cm, clear margins >10mm, no lymphovascular space invasion, 0/18 lymph nodes

cancer_timeline.value: Laparoscopic radical hysterectomy and pelvic lymph node dissection
Histology confirms 2.2cm moderately differentiated adenocarcinoma, clear margins, no LVSI, 18 negative nodes
Three month post-operative review shows good recovery, no evidence of disease

patient_facts.value: Well-healed vault, normal abdominal examination with healed laparoscopy ports
Returned to work part-time, gradually increasing activity levels

status_updates.value: Early stage cervical adenocarcinoma treated with radical surgery. Excellent recovery with no evidence of disease at 3 months post-op
Good recovery from surgery with return to work and increasing activity
Oncology follow up in 3 months with vault smear
